body:
@jovypogi26 "if you ask for translations, you will die"

tfw cant read

it’s like saying, “I can’t fathom why people want translations for isekai #9273682, because I know OP isekai MC is just going to destroy everyone.” People don’t read for plot, people read for enjoyment.
@fallenFromMeaning Those little idiotic lines are what makes it 100x better
I can translate this on commission. Hit me up on ehentai forums.

for some works on this site, a translation is essential for full enjoyment, but in this case you can very much anticipate that there is no story to speak of, just the usual moaning and "he came 300 times in her pussy while she almost passed out from the pleasure", so why are you so insistent for this particular work to be translated, i cant fathom

Translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate translate
I don't care if I die, I want/need this translated. O.O OMG..
